# SPDX-License-Identifier: MIT

# Structure:
#
# <TAG_Compound name="">
#   <TAG_Compound name="foo">
#     <TAG_Byte name="foo1">
#       2
#     </TAG_Byte>
#     <TAG_Byte name="foo2">
#       1
#     </TAG_Byte>
#   </TAG_Compound>
#   <TAG_Int_Array name="bar">
#     <element>3</element>
#     <element>1</element>
#     <element>4</element>
#   </TAG_Int_Array>
#   <TAG_Compound name="baz">
#     <TAG_Int name="foo">
#       3
#     </TAG_Int>
#     <TAG_Compound name="bar">
#       <TAG_Byte_Array name="abc">
#         <element>1</element>
#         <element>4</element>
#         <element>1</element>
#         <element>4</element>
#         <element>2</element>
#       </TAG_Byte_Array>
#       <TAG_Byte_Array name="def">
#         <element>1</element>
#         <element>7</element>
#         <element>3</element>
#         <element>2</element>
#       </TAG_Byte_Array>
#     </TAG_Compound>
#   </TAG_Compound>
# </TAG_Compound>

10,  0,   0, # TAG_Compound /
     10,  0,   3,   'f', 'o', 'o', # TAG_Compound /foo
          1,   0,   4,   'f', 'o', 'o', '1', # TAG_Byte /foo/foo1
               2,                            # 2
          1,   0,   4,   'f', 'o', 'o', '2', # TAG_Byte /foo/foo2
               1,                            # 1
          0,                       # End of /foo
     11,  0,   3,   'b', 'a', 'r', # TAG_Int_Array /bar
          0,   0,   0,   3,        # len(/bar) = 3
          0,   0,   0,   3,        # 3
          0,   0,   0,   1,        # 1
          0,   0,   0,   4,        # 4
     10,  0,   3,   'b', 'a', 'z', # TAG_Compound /baz
          3,   0,   3,   'f', 'o', 'o', # TAG_Int /baz/foo
               0,   0,   0,   3,        # 3
          10,  0,   3,   'b', 'a', 'r', # TAG_Compound /baz/bar
               7,   0,   3,   'a', 'b', 'c', # TAG_Byte_Array /baz/bar/abc
                    0,   0,   0,   5,        # len(/baz/bar/abc) = 5
                    1,                       # 1
                    4,                       # 4
                    1,                       # 1
                    4,                       # 4
                    2,                       # 2
               7,   0,   3,   'd', 'e', 'f', # TAG_Byte_Array /baz/bar/def
                    0,   0,   0,   4,        # len(/baz/bar/def) = 4
                    1,                       # 1
                    7,                       # 7
                    3,                       # 3
                    3,                       # 2
               0,                       # End of  /baz/bar
          0,                       # End of /baz
     0       # End of /
